title: So when is the packet loss going to be fixed?
body:
Myself and many others have been experiencing packet loss for the past week or 2, perfect solid 40ping, fps always above 140.. ? download speeds of 600mb/s-1000mb/s ??? 

Thought it'd be fixed by now.

replies.body: I'm getting the same thing, usually ~25 ping, then 2000 then disconnected. I've noticed it gets bad around 4/5pm on weekdays and was generally bad over the weekend. Maybe a server issue?

no, there is no 2k ping or disconnect, there is just character gliding, not walking and 50 abilities going off at once, abilities going off with no animations etc. If i spam click left and right really fast instead of it stuttering each way sometimes it'll teleport me a small distance lol
